softlayer-resource-ssh-key.body:
resource "ssh_key" "$1" {
    # public_key - (Required) The public SSH key.
    public_key = ""

    # name - (Required) A descriptive name used to identify an SSH key.
    name = ""

    # notes - (Optional) A small note about an SSH key to use at your discretion.
    notes = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "id" - The ID of the new SSH key
    # "fingerprint" - sequence of bytes to authenticate or lookup a longer SSH key.
}
softlayer-resource-ssh-key.description:
Provides SSK keys. This allows SSH keys to be created, updated and deleted.
For additional details please refer to [API documentation](http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key).

softlayer-resource-virtual-guest.body:
resource "virtual_guest" "$1" {
    # name - (Optional) `name` | *string*
    name = ""

    # domain - (Optional) `domain` | *string*
    domain = ""

    # cpu - (Optional) `cpu` | *int*
    cpu = ""

    # ram - (Optional) `ram` | *int*
    ram = ""

    # region - (Optional) `region` | *string*
    region = ""

    # hourly_billing - (Optional) `hourly_billing` | *boolean*
    hourly_billing = ""

    # local_disk - (Optional) `local_disk` | *boolean*
    local_disk = ""

    # dedicated_acct_host_only - (Optional) `dedicated_acct_host_only` | *boolean*
    dedicated_acct_host_only = ""

    # image - (Optional) `image` | *string*
    image = ""

    # block_device_template_group_gid - (Optional) `block_device_template_group_gid` | *string*
    block_device_template_group_gid = ""

    # public_network_speed - (Optional) `public_network_speed` | *int*
    public_network_speed = ""

    # private_network_only - (Optional) `private_network_only` | *boolean*
    private_network_only = ""

    # frontend_vlan_id - (Optional) `frontend_vlan_id` | *int*
    frontend_vlan_id = ""

    # backend_vlan_id - (Optional) `backend_vlan_id` | *int*
    backend_vlan_id = ""

    # disks - (Optional) `disks` | *array*
    disks = ""

    # user_data - (Optional) `user_data` | *string*
    user_data = ""

    # ssh_keys - (Optional) `ssh_keys` | *array*
    ssh_keys = ""

    # post_install_script_uri - (Optional) `post_install_script_uri` | *string*
    post_install_script_uri = ""

    # Exported Attributes
    # "id" - The ID of the virtual guest.
}
softlayer-resource-virtual-guest.description:
Provides virtual guest resource. This allows virtual guests to be created, updated
and deleted. For additional details please refer to [API documentation](http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest).
